Free Marriott Application Online
Marriot Hotel application online - In 1927, J Willard Marriott and his wife opened a root beer stand n Washington D.C. This was just the beginning; they believed that the people needed a place to get something cool to drink.
The continued to grow their enterprise and expanded not only into other food industries, such as restaurants but also into the hotel business.
Marriot Hotel Application - Today the Marriott is located across the globe with over 3,100 properties in the United States alone. They also have hotels in 68 other territories and countries. More than half of their hotels are full service hotels but they also have select service and extended stay lodges as well.
Job openings at Marriot Hotel: As with many of the hotels one of the first people that the customer is going to interact with is the front desk person. Benefits of working at the Marriot Hotel jobs ( see also Abercrombie Application , American Eagle Outfitters Application , Mcdonalds application online , or Gap Application ) Marriot Hotel careers : As the Guest Service Representative youll organize, process, confirm, and conduct all check-ins/check outs. Youll also secure payment, verify billing, activate room keys, reserve rooms, handle requests, changes, and cancellations. There is a lot to do just to keep the hotels booking system completely organized. There is opportunity to move up to a supervisory position.
Housekeeping is also very important at the Marriott. As a housekeeper it is your job to keep the place looking nice. You will need to be prompt in responding to requests from guests as well as other departments in the facility. Youll have to make sure your cart is full of supplies and placed in the assigned area after each shift. Guest privacy is important so youll have to follow protocol to gain entry into their rooms.
Full service hotels also hold banquets and have room service as well as other amenities. Because of this they have extra positions available. You can work as a server for both the banquets and room service. As a server you will be responsible for transporting food and drinks to guests. You will also have to help set up and breakdown functions as well as clean up the banquet area when finished.
Remember, with all things in life, you MUST take action! You MUST stay persistent in order to accomplish your goals in finding work.
It's all about taking advantage of all your resource, and today you have the internet on your side!
Apply for jobs online and stay focused on your goals!
Apply at Marriot Hotel Application Online in your area
